******************************************************************************
*                          FTS proudly presents:                             *
*  	          Euro Truck Simulator 2 v1.5.2.1s Incl DLC                  *
*                            (C) SCS Software                                *
******************************************************************************
* Date: 20.09.2013                   * Game Type : Simulator                 *
* Disk(s): 1                         * Protection: SteamStub + Custom        *
* ****************************************************************************

 ******************************
**      **Game Notes:**       **
 ****************************** 

NOTE:
This release includes the DLC East and 3DM crack that prevents the
trucks from changing colors

--
 
Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers     
important cargo across impressive distances!                         
                                                                     
With dozens of cities to explore from the UK, Belgium, Italy,        
the Netherlands, Poland, and many more, your endurance, skill and    
speed will all be pushed to their limits.                            
                                                                     
If you've got what it takes to be part of an elite trucking force,   
get behind the wheel and prove it!                                   
                                                                     
* Transport a vast variety of cargo across more than 60 European     
  cities.                                                            
                                                                     
* Run your own business which continues to grow even as you          
  complete your freight deliveries.                                  
                                                                     
* Buy your own fleet of trucks, buy garages, hire drivers,           
  manage your company for maximum profits.                           
                                                                     
* A varied amount of truck tuning that range from performance to     
  cosmetic changes.                                                  
                                                                     
* Customize your vehicles with optional lights, bars, horns,         
  beacons, smoke exhausts, and more.                                 
                                                                     
* Thousands of miles of real road networks with hundereds of         
  famous landmarks and structures.

 ***************************** 
**   **Install Notes:**      **
 ***************************** 
 
1. Unpack release
2. Mount or burn .iso file
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack to game directory
5. Play.

 ******************************** 
**   **Additional Notes:**      **
 ******************************** 

This is the full game updated to v1.5.2.1s

Credits:
3DMGAME for SteamEmu
